name: Hydrate
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
When you cast this spell, choose one of two effects:
>You create up to a 20 foot cube of water centered on a target point in range you can see. It is ordinary water, suitable for drinking, and obeys the laws of physics immediately after being created.
>You cause rain to fall in a 40 foot radius cylinder 100 feet tall for 1 hour. Enough water will fall by the duration to fill the entire area with up to 5 feet of water if it has nowhere else to go.
